### Global Capability with Local Service


[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="25px"][vc_column_text]Unified Microsystems provides shared web hosting services, dedicated server solutions, VPS cloud server solutions from our UAE and Philippines based data-centres, along with services worldwide from Azure (as a Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider).



 	
  * Application Hosting

 	
  * Web Hosting

 	
  * Cloud Services

 	
  * Cloud Migration

 	
  * Disaster Recovery Backup Targets

 	
  * Business Continuity Sites

 	
  * Dedicated Servers

 	
  * Virtual Private Servers

 	
  * VPS Hosting

 	
  * Shared Servers (cPanel/Plesk)

 	
  * Colocation

 	
  * IP Transit

 	
  * Hosting solutions


[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_type="row" type="full_width" text_align="left" css_animation=""][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height="100px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation="" row_type="row" use_row_as_full_screen_section="no" type="grid" angled_section="no" text_align="left" background_image="573" background_image_as_pattern="without_pattern" css=".vc_custom_1538647516490{background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" z_index=""][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="100px"][vc_column_text]


### Infrastructure Designed for Reliability


[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="25px"][vc_column_text]


#### Resilient power, cooling and connectivity, with 24/7/365 monitoring and support.


[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="25px"][vc_row_inner row_type="row" type="grid" text_align="left" css_animation=""][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][service_table title="Network" title_tag="h5" title_background_type="background_color_type" icon="fa-code" icon_size="fa-3x" title_color="#000000"]



 	
  * Multi-route BGP redundancy for active network equipment.

 	
  * Worldwide low-latency fibre interconnects

 	
  * FLAG Reliance, GBI, EIG, FALCON connectivity

 	
  * Segregated public and private networks per customer


[/service_table][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][service_table title="Protection" title_tag="h5" title_background_type="background_color_type" icon="fa-lock" icon_size="fa-3x" title_color="#000000"]

 	
  * Single entrance, man trap and full height in and out turnstiles

 	
  * Dedicated on-site security 24/7/365

 	
  * CCTV, biometric access and alarm system.

 	
  * Multi-zoned gas suppression system


[/service_table][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][service_table title="Power & Cooling" title_tag="h5" title_background_type="background_color_type" icon="fa-compress" icon_size="fa-3x" title_color="#000000"]

 	
  * N+1 distributed redundant UPS

 	
  * 6MW utility supply (6 feeds)

 	
  * 4 x 1.6 MW generators (N+1)

 	
  * 1.35 kW/mÂ² Cooling Capacity (N+1)

 	
  * Heavy duty anti-static raised floor


[/service_table][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][service_table title="Compliance" title_tag="h5" title_background_type="background_color_type" icon="fa-database" icon_size="fa-3x" title_color="#000000"]

 	
  * ISO 27001

 	
  * ISO 9001:2015

 	
  * OHSAS 18001

 	
  * PCI DSS

 	
  * SOC 1 Type II

 	
  * SOC 2 Type II

### Our Network Operations Centre


[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="25px"][vc_column_text]We offer comprehensive hosting solutions with our enterprise grade monitoring tools and expert dedicated support team.



 	
  * Enterprise Monitoring 24/7/365

 	
  * Dedicated in-house support team 24/7/365

 	
  * Ticketing system

 	
  * Automated preventative maintenance scheduling

 	
  * Vital Health Statistics

 	
  * Patch Management

 	
  * Website Availability Tests

 	
  * Excessive Bandwidth Alerts

 	
  * Network Intrusion Detection

 	
  * Denial of Service Attack Prevention

 	
  * Excessive Processor Load
